messages.message: Contrarian opinion: I already find it hard to search both gdocs and confluence (EDIT: and Git) for things…can we pick one? :laughing:

Option C: none of the above, just don’t document things anymore.
:joy:
I kid
I do find that both suck to search and navigate. I think I prefer editing in gdocs but confluence is "better" in terms of presentation options. But yea... searchability is kinda crap on both, and compounds when trying to find something in both
